Key Match Events: Isaiah Joe scored 31 points, including eight 3-pointers.
The Knicks lost 126-101 to the Thunder.
The Knicks allowed 126 or more points for the sixth time this season.
Mikal Bridges struggled defensively against Gilgeous-Alexander.
OG Anunoby missed all of his shots during the first half.
Jalen Brunson has converted multiple 3s in a game just once since Dec. 21.
Post-Match Reflections: Mikal Bridges emphasized the need to improve defense despite offensive struggles.
Tom Thibodeau highlighted the need for multiple defensive efforts.
Josh Hart mentioned the importance of executing and maintaining intensity.
Jalen Brunson acknowledged the potential of the Knicks' defense.
Karl-Anthony Towns noted that not all games will be perfect.
